thread.title: BRIEF-Nova Leap Announces Execution Of Definitive Agreement To Acquire Home Care Services Business

title: BRIEF-Nova Leap Announces Execution Of Definitive Agreement To Acquire Home Care Services Business

organizations.name: min read   nova leap health corp
acquire home care services business reuters staff

text: March 19, 2018 / 2:48 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Nova Leap Announces Execution Of Definitive Agreement To Acquire Home Care Services Business Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Nova Leap Health Corp: * NOVA LEAP HEALTH CORP. ANNOUNCES EXECUTION OF DEFINITIVE AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE HOME CARE SERVICES BUSINESS IN NEW ENGLAND, U.S. * NOVA LEAP HEALTH CORP - ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO BE IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE​ * NOVA LEAP HEALTH CORP - ‍ACQUISITION IS TO BE MADE FOR TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF $1.2 MILLION * NOVA LEAP HEALTH CORP - ‍EXPECTS TO RAISE A COMBINATION OF DEBT AND EQUITY TO FUND TRANSACTION​
